tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It's rare to encounter such exceptional doctors. We found this doctor through a reference when my father fractured his ankle. He needed immediate surgery with titanium plates and it took nearly a year for him to walk properly again as he is a senior citizen. He eventually recovered well and fine now.

From our first contact, the doctor promptly attended to my father's case, providing all the necessary care. Most good doctors fulfill their basic responsibilities, but only a few go the extra mile to ensure their patients receive the best care possible. This doctor did exactly that.

He ensured we received the right services at the Hospital, helped us through the insurance process, conscious about the budget, provided comprehensive information on the recovery timeline, and outlined the necessary measures and medications. He was also very attentive to my parents' needs, given their age, and was always available for direct assistance. 

Given that my parents live in a different city, he followed up with them for weeks after the surgery to ensure my father was recovering well. He even provided a reference for another doctor in the other city if needed.

I've never met a doctor like him and strongly recommend him for any orthopedic care.

tags: None
review: Dr Mithun has done double knee replacement surgery for my mother. It was very good experience. Surgery was done with no issues. Recovery was fast. He has helped us with post surgery physio therapy as well. We are following up with him every 3 months as my mother has sins of arthritis. Right now she hlis walking normally with no issues and pain in her knees.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a back injury (slip disc). The pain was unbearable. Since I had already shown it to couple of doctors, I was looking for the best orthopedic doctor.

My case was checked by Dr. Mithun N Oswal who not only cured my problem within a few weeks but also provided me with post-recovery tips which ensured that I could resume my daily lifestyle and work in minimal time.

Dr. Mithun is a specialist in Orthopedic, Knee and hip joint replacement, Sports injuries and Arthroscopy.

 If you are looking for good orthopedic doctors, I would highly recommend you to visit Parshwa Ortho & Women's Care Centre, Bangalore.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Went for my knee problem. Had ACL ligament issue and it required surgery. After almost meeting many doctors in the city, finally got done arthroscopy ACL surgery from Dr Mithun. I am back to my normal routine after 6weeks post surgery. His protocols are finest. I recommend him for same.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My experience with Dr. Mithun has been absolutely amazing. I had met with an accident which left me with a broken collarbone on my left side and a dislocated metacarpal on my right hand. Dr. Mithun did both surgeries and it was done so skillfully. I had a speedy recovery. He is really the perfect surgeon because not only is he really good at his job, but he also checks up on the patient after the surgery and makes sure the patient is okay. I would 100% recommend him!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Oswal is a very experienced doctor and I'm blessed to have recommended to him. I was very afraid of my tibia surgery because of hospital phobia but he consoled me with his motivated words. He is very friendly throughout the process and makes me understand everything. 
He is always reachable at any time, a very friendly, supportive, and down-to-earth doctor
I will always recommend him.

review:
I had a bad fall in 2019 which resulted in fracture in my arm. I visited Dr Mithun and he seemed very confident and spoke to me in a simple understandable terms and treated me well... 

But very recently I visited him again for lower back pain. He took one look and said it was a result of bad form while exercising and treated me with much professional courtesy. ********** *** *** *** ******* ** ******* *********** ****** *** ************* I recovered very well in a matter of few days!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We visited for treatment of a finger that got crushed by coming in door. 

We first visited Manipal where they suggested plastic surgery along with a very detailed and expensive treatment plan (~1.5 lacs) which seemed risky. 
We visited Dr. Mithun for second opinion but were surprised how he did not create a panic situation but explained the situation and alternatives. 
What initially seemed to be a risky expensive treatment turned out to be a simple stitching procedure. 
The doc was always available on phone to see the progress of the wound and answer any worries.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ****** ** ********* ******* ******** I have had multiple yet unrelated surgeries, 2 of which are orthopaedic in nature, till date. I had a driving accident in 2020 which resulted in Radius Shaft Fracture with DRUJ Instability in my Left forearm. Under Dr. Mithun's consultation, I underwent surgery and recovered more than 95% of wrist movements within weeks. 2 weeks ago, I underwent another surgery under him to get the implants removed and have observed no pain since then.  He is soft spoken, explains the issue with care and in detail and takes care of his patients like family members. Henceforth, I highly  recommend him for any orthopaedic consultations.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Mithun is very friendly and listens to the patient with utmost patience and suggest the right treatment. Instead of recommending too many medicines, he insists on physical exercises at home that can bring down the pain.
